Name: Tubocurarine

Title: [Metabolism and pharmacokinetics of atracurium].

Sentece: The effect-site concentration associated with 50% paralysis of twitch increased after 3 weeks from approximately 250 to 750 ng/ml.
Title: The changing pharmacodynamics of metocurine identify the onset and offset of canine gastrocnemius disuse atrophy.
